wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Charles Sorrell (born 17 October 1966) is a former professional footballer who played in The Football League for Maidstone United, Colchester United and Barnet. He also played non-league football for Barking, Boston United and Dagenham & Redbridge.

response: He was the uncle of former Maidstone United, Colchester United and Barnet footballer Tony Sorrell.
